name: "Code Red" Cheese Spread
author: Chef John
summary: This 'dangerously spicy' party snack is so easy and tasty. People sometimes say this creamy, cheesy pepper spread is too spicy, but then they keep eating it. Naturally, you can adjust the heat for your personal tastes. I like to serve this with crisp flatbreads.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons ghost pepper hot sauce, or to taste
1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
directions: Place cream cheese, fromage blanc, tomato paste, cider vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, onion, and garlic powder in a bowl
Add sriracha sauce, ghost pepper sauce, sweet and hot paprika, chipotle powder, and cayenne pepper
Stir until well combined and the cheeses are completely blended in
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate about 3 hours or, ideally, overnight
